= Vimwiki =

== Leader Commands ==

=== Wiki management ===

* *\ww* open index file
* *\wt* open index file in new tab
* *\ws* list available wikis

=== Diary ===

* *\wi* open the diary index
* *\w\i* update current diary index
* *\w\w* open today's diary file

=== Navigation ===
* *<ENTER>* on links to navigate
* *<BACKSPACE>* to navigate back
